DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate safety effectiveness Foot Mechanical stimulation improve Gait Gait Related Disorders Parkinson Disease Progressive Supranuclear Palsy stable motor fluctuation .
DOC.brief_title: Foot Mechanical Stimulation Treatment Gait Gait Related Disorders Parkinson 's Disease Progressive Supranuclear Palsy .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis idiopathic PD PSP UK Brain Bank criterion , Able walk 25 foot unassisted minimal assistance ; On stable dos Parkinson 's medication least 2 week prior study onset ; Endurance sufficient stand least 20 minute unassisted per patient report . Other significant neurological orthopedic problem .
